definition: the current period/this term (usually in finance)
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: The feature in this section seems to set up a round-table conversation.
sentences.chinese: 本期的“注目”专题，更像是试图搭建一次圆桌对话。

sentences.english: It should be noted that all the articles published in this issue are contributed by the DTTTIG, to which we owe our acknowledgement.
sentences.chinese: 本期所刊论文均由大唐集团提供，在此特表谢意。

sentences.english: The programme looks at useful phrases for structuring answers in a job interview.
sentences.chinese: 答案在本期节目文字稿的最后一页。

sentences.english: In today's program, celebrity, Yang Lan talks about rainforest protection with Kathy Yin.
sentences.chinese: 在本期节目中，杨澜与尹畅面对面，倾谈雨林保护。

sentences.english: In this volume, Ajiao looks for a job over the summer to pay for her student loans.
sentences.chinese: 本期轻喜剧，阿娇要趁暑假当家教赚钱还助学贷款。

sentences.english: Here are some entertainments that enable to you have a good time at home.
sentences.chinese: 本期我们就来推荐一些在家也能很开心的娱乐项目。

sentences.english: Talents are required in HUEYA Energy for this Job Advertisement.
sentences.chinese: 本期招聘，仅包括华扬能源和华扬电信两个业务板块。

sentences.english: This episode is called "Giving Warnings and Cautions."
A letter from a reader in the feedback section of this issue noted how he likes to print out parts of the digital PC World.
sentences.chinese: 在本期杂志中，有读者来信反馈称想打印某些内容。

sentences.english: The special double-issue of People hits news stands on Friday.
sentences.chinese: 《人物》杂志本期特刊将于本周五上架。

sentences.english: From this period case, this print will introduce these setting an example in succession door successful example.
sentences.chinese: 从本期起，本刊将陆续介绍这些示范户的成功事例。

sentences.english: At this time, Erlitou Culture displayed a trend of decline and fall.
sentences.chinese: 二里头文化势力在本期呈现的是一种衰亡趋势。

sentences.english: Next the net income of this period is added to the beginning retained earnings.
sentences.chinese: 接下来是把本期的净收益与期初留存收益相加。

sentences.english: An expense may have been incurred in the current accounting period even though no bill has yet been received.
sentences.chinese: 本期即使没有收到账单，费用也有可能已经发生。

sentences.english: The magazines are shown with the date of issue and the name of the article.
sentences.chinese: 所列出的期刊都注有发行日期和本期上的文章的题目。

definition: editor in charge (abbr. for 責任編輯|责任编辑[ze2 ren4 bian1 ji2])
(publishing) (abbr. for 美術編輯|美术编辑[mei3 shu4 bian1 ji2]) layout and graphics/graphic design/art editor/graphic designer
regular column or segment (in a publication or broadcast program)/program (TV or radio)
this text/article/the main body of a book
specially engaged/employed or commissioned for a special task
to weave/to plait/to organize/to group/to arrange/to edit/to compile/to write/to compose/to fabricate
to supervise the manufacture of/to supervise the shooting of films/executive producer (film)
